entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
